content: of the two sides are joined by knitting the coronet with 8 spikes matching 3-needle knit together to join the tops of the sides and knit the coronet the ridges 3-needle bind off to join the tail edges together without sewing the technic the head is knit in the round starting from picked up stitches on the neck and the is detailed in this pattern sides it finishes with the snout which is a 8-st i-cord i-cord for the string between the eyes an other i-cord is required to support the eyes and create a little mechanism basic embroidering for the smile and for the black stars in the eyes to prevent the stuffing to escape to the body from the tail and the head two internal magic circles in crochet for the eyes membranes are knit a 110st spherical egg is made following separate specific pattern and attached with an i-cord to the internal back membrane froggybug 2-in-1 seahorse v3 page 1 of 16 belly garter stitch full row high level instructions chart the belly starts from the tail with 3 stitches and finishes with 8 stitches at the neck increase 1 st on each side every 2 row until there are 18 increase 1 st on each side every 4 row until there are 24 row 30 k24 row 31 slot for the egg k3 cast off 18 until 3 st are left k3 row 32 k3 cast on 18 k3 from row 33 to the end increase 1 st on each side every 4 row until there are 28 k28 for 23 more row decrease 1 st on each side every 4 row until there are 8 froggybug 2-in-1 seahorse v3 page 2 of 16 belly - detailed instructions cast on 3 row 21 k1 kfb k14 kfb k1 row 70-71-72 k22 row 1-2 k3 row 22-23-24 k20 row 73 k1 sko k16 sko k1 row 3 k1 kfb k1 row 25 k1 kfb k16 kfb k1 row 74-75-76 k20 row 4 k4 row 26-27-28 k22 row 77 k1 sko k14 sko k1 row 5 k1 kfb kfb k1 row 29 k1 kfb k18 kfb k1 row 78-79-80 k18 row 6 k6 row 30 k24 row 81 k1 sko k12 sko k1 row 7 k1 kfb k2 kfb k1 row 31 slot for the egg k3 cast off 18 k2 so that row 82-83-84 k16 row 8 k8 there are 3 stitches on each side of the slot row 85 k1 sko k10 sko k1 row 9 k1 kfb k4 kfb k1 row 32 k3 cast on 18 k3 row 86-87-88 k14 row 10 k10 row 33 k1 kfb k20 kfb k1 row 89 k1 sko k8 sko k1 row 11 k1 kfb k6 kfb k1 row 34-35-36 k26 row 90-91-92 k12 row 12 k12 row 37 k1 kfb k22 kfb k1 row 93 k1 sko k6 sko k1 row 13 k1 kfb k8 kfb k1 row 38 to row 60 for 23 row k28 row 94-95-96
